---
title: Interleukin 6 (IL-6)
---


Interleukin-6 (IL-6) is a member of the pro-inflammatory cytokine family, induces the expression of a variety of proteins responsible for acute inflammation, and plays an important role in the proliferation and differentiation of cells in humans @uciechowskiInterleukin6MasterplayerCytokine2020

- Interleukin-6: A Masterplayer in the Cytokine Network @uciechowskiInterleukin6MasterplayerCytokine2020
:::



# Mediation

"IL-6 signaling is mediated by building a complex of IL-6, the transmembrane IL-6 receptor (mIL-6R) or with soluble forms of IL-6R (sIL-6R), and the signal-transducing subunit molecule gp130" @uciechowskiInterleukin6MasterplayerCytokine2020
